sourcesContent:
NoteWise

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { DataService } from '../services/data.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.scss'] }) export class HeaderComponent { constructor(private dataService:DataService){} isAuth(){ return this.dataService.userAuth(); } logout(){ localStorage.removeItem('user'); } }
